newsitem.title: FINLAND: LANNEN TEHTAAT JOINS FOOD SECTOR RALLY.
newsitem.headline: LANNEN TEHTAAT JOINS FOOD SECTOR RALLY.

text.p: Shares in Finnish foodstuffs and animal feed group Lannen Tehtaat Oy rose sharply in healthy volume on Friday after recent gains in other food sector stocks, brokers said.
At 1530/1230 GMT, Lannen Tehtaat traded at 57.00 markka, up 5.00 markka or almost ten percent. Volume was over seven million markka, most of which however consisted of a big in-house deal.
Recent strong gains in Raision Tehtaat Oy particularly helped Lannen Tehtaat, brokers said.
